camera_and_perspective.view_angle: Wide-angle Aerial Drone Shot, 45Â° Bird's eye view, Establishing context shot
camera_and_perspective.lens_attributes: 24mm Wide-angle lens, Rectilinear projection, High clarity edge-to-edge, Deep depth of field
camera_and_perspective.depth_of_field: Deep focus, Hyperfocal distance, Sharp texture details from foreground wet roads to background mountains

lighting_and_atmosphere.time_of_day: Overcast Twilight, Late Blue Hour (Sun is set, cloudy sky), Post-rain evening
lighting_and_atmosphere.light_quality: Soft Diffuse Skylight (Cloudy), No harsh directional sunlight, Even global illumination, Balanced exposure between sky and ground
lighting_and_atmosphere.weather_conditions: Overcast with heavy textured clouds, Post-rain atmosphere (Wet ground), Cool humid air, distant mountain haze
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Very soft ambient occlusion (AO) only, No distinct cast shadows, Diffuse shading under trees and buildings

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: Warm Tungsten Office Spill (3000K), High visibility through large glass curtain walls, Checkerboard occupancy pattern, Soft glow emanating from lobbies
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Minimal exterior decorative lighting, White stone facades reflecting the cool grey sky, Subtle linear accents

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Street markings highly visible due to wet contrast, Faint reflection of street lamps on wet asphalt
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Natural ambient lighting (low light), Dark lush greens absorbing the skylight, No aggressive artificial uplighting

color_and_grading.palette_theme: Muted Cool Tones, Slate Grey/Blue environment vs Warm Honey/Amber interiors, Desaturated realism
color_and_grading.temperature: Overall Cool/Neutral bias (6500K Sky) contrasting with localized Warmth (3000K Windows)
color_and_grading.post_processing: Low Contrast Film Look, 'Raw' photography aesthetic, Slight desaturation, High clarity on road textures, Natural white balance

rendering_tech_specs.engine_style: Corona Renderer (Wet material focus), V-Ray 6, Unreal Engine 5
rendering_tech_specs.artistic_medium: Photorealistic Architectural Visualization, Mood-based Landscape Photography
rendering_tech_specs.detail_level: 8k resolution, Hyper-realistic wet asphalt textures, Detailed cloud volume

environment_textures.ground_surface: Wet asphalt roads (Post-rain) with specular sky reflections, White road markings showing high contrast, Manicured curvy lawns
environment_textures.foliage_style: Dark dense tree canopies, lush green landscaping, soft transitions between grass and pavement
